Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38710 affecting package libreswan for versions less than 4.7-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-38710 affecting package libreswan for versions less than 4.7-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libreswan is earlier than 4.7-6, affected by CVE-2023-38710
